content.text: Mr. SCHWEIKERT. Mr. Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.
content.speaker: Mr. SCHWEIKERT

content.text:
The motion was agreed to; accordingly (at 9 o'clock and 23 minutes 
p.m.), under its previous order, the House adjourned until tomorrow, 
Thursday, November 16, 2017, at 9 a.m.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
